name: Chronomatic Enhancer
description: A Large Construct with a complex design, capable of manipulating time around it. It features robust armor and gears that whir and click, signifying its advanced technology.
memorable: Its ability to alter time in combat dramatically shifts the dynamics, providing advantages to allies and hindering foes.
goals: To support allies in battle while debuffing enemies using its time-manipulating abilities.
relations: Often encountered with other constructs or as a guardian for powerful magic users.
environment: Typically found in locations tied to advanced technology or ancient magic.
strengths: Immunities to poison and psychic damage, along with damage resistance to nonmagical attacks, makes it resilient.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma, suggesting a lack of strategic depth compared to more intelligent beings.
attacks: Engages in melee with powerful slam attacks while deploying time-altering abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Time-Infused Gears allow it to boost allies or debilitate enemies with effects like Energizing Electricity and Slowing Gas.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, along with a passive perception of 16, allowing it to perceive threats effectively.
skills: Furthermore, it has a good Wisdom score which aids in perception tasks.
additional_information: Utilizes a special ability, Delay, to postpone damage taken.
Immutable Form protects it from altering spells or effects.
Can freeze opponents in time or enhance allies' capabilities during combat.
test_queries: large tactical construct with time abilities
durable construct supporting allies in battle
creature using slowing gas in combat
